snippet: The British bank had hoped to redeem a series of bonds early in a move that it said would save it more than $300 million a year.
abstract: DealBook Online; British court rules Lloyds Banking Group cannot redeem series of high-interest bonds, called enhanced capital notes, that it issued in 2009.
lead_paragraph: The British bank had hoped to redeem a series of bonds early in a move that it said would save it more than $300 million a year.

headline.main: Court Rules Against Lloyds Banking Group on Bond Redemption
